bibl.title: Shrek v. Berry. Commitment on Sentence Form
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Whitman} ss.
To any Constable, and Keeper of the County Jail of said County:

WHEREAS, At a Justice's court, held at my office in said county, for the Examination trial of Michael Schrek for the offense hereinafter stated, the said Michael Schrek was convicted of having, on the ..... day of ...... 188...., in said county, committed the held to keep the Peace towards all the people of the Territory of Washington and especially towards Frank Pashmen for the period of six months, and his bail now fixed the sum of Five Hundred Dollars and upon conviction, the said court did adjudge and determine that the said.... and __ should be imprisoned in the county jail of said county for six months in de- days. fault of giving said bail.

THEREFORE, You, the said Constable, are commanded, in the name of the United States, forthwith to convey and deliver the said Michael Schrek to the said keeper, and you, the said keeper, are hereby commanded to receive the said Michael Schrek into your custody in said jail and him there ssafely keep until the expiration of said six months or he give said bail days, or until he shall thence be discharged by due course of law.
Dated the 23 d day of October A.D. 1888
Wm A. Imman Justice of the Peace.
